aboutContent: I hold a Master’s degree in Engineering, and I’ve had the privilege of working with major software companies as well as a variety of clients around the world. I’ve contributed both as part of collaborative teams and in solo projects, giving me the versatility to adapt to different workflows and deliver value in any setting. From building intuitive, responsive front-end interfaces to designing scalable back-end systems, I enjoy taking projects end-to-end and turning ideas into reality.
aboutHeadlineB: — a full-stack software engineer with 3 years of professional experience.
contactHeadline: Let’s work together! Feel free to contact me using the form below.
headline: Full-stack Developer — building smooth, performant, and user-friendly web experiences.
name: Name

tripTimelinePlanner.description: When traveling to multiple destinations in a row, I found it difficult to keep track of all bookings and details. I developed this app that allows you to manage your travel itinerary, including flights, accommodations, and activities, in a more intuitive way than a simple notepad.
tripTimelinePlanner.stack: Full-stack web app, coded using Ruby on Rails (back-end), React (front-end)
